channel.title: Homes on Zheng Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Zheng Wang

item.description: I work to make software development easier and more accessible so that every programmer can easily write, maintain and optimise software. I maintain a list of must-read research papers for machine learning in compilers. I am interested in solving real-world problems by building working prototypes to be tested in real-life environments and real computing hardware using realistic workloads. I lead the Intelligent Systems Software Lab. My research interests include: Program optimisation and analysis: I am interested in how we can design new algorithms and optimisation techniques at compilers and operating systems to improve application performance and energy efficiency.

item.title: News
item.description: [Jan, 2025] PROM received a distingusished paper award at CGO 2025 [Oct, 2024] Congratulations to Xiaoyang and Huanting winning the AI SuperConnector Award; Each is given a £20K seed fund to commercialise their research. [March, 2024] Received CGO 2024 Test-of-time Award for my CGO’13 paper; selected as a paper that was published 10 – 12 years prior and has had a lasting impact on the field. [September, 2023] New 24-month Innovative UK project awarded (PI) - An RA post will open soon.

item.title: Research Team
item.description: For more information, see the group page. Research Fellows Xiaoyang Sun Jingzhi Gong - KTP Associate with TurinTech Huanting Wang PhD Students Yachao Zhu, 04 / 2021 - (Funded by PhD Scholarship); Patrick Lenihan, 10 / 2021 - (Funded by School of Computing DTP Scholarship); Beite Yang, 10 / 2021 - (co-supervised with Amirul Khan and Peter Jimack); Yiming Ma, 09 / 2023 - (Funded by Industry PhD scholarship); Hua Wei Zhang, 10 / 2023 - (Funded by DTP scholarship); Ce Yang, 10 / 2023 - Xiao Qin, 10 / 2024 - Yucheol Choi, 03 / 2025 - Yassine Marzouk, 10 / 2025 - (Funded by DLA Case studentship); Research Assistants and Software Engineers Yuhang Wu JInyi Fan Alumni Huanting Wang, 10 / 2021 - 09 / 2025 - now Research Fellow at University of Leeds Ying Wu, 01 / 2021 - 09 / 2025 - now Assistant Professor at Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University Shenghao Qiu, 10 / 2020 - 09 / 2025 - now Research Fellow in University of York Jiayu Zhao, 10 / 2020 - 05 / 2025 - now with Huawei Cambridge Lab Chunwei Xia 05 / 2023 - 09 / 2024 - now Lecturer at University of Leeds Xiaoyang Sun 10 / 2019 - 11 / 2023 - now Research Fellow at University of Leeds Yiming Wang Visiting PhD Student 2023 - 2024 Rodrigo Caetano Rocha 10 / 2016 - 07 / 2021 - now Senior Researcher at Huawei Edinburgh Lab Ben Taylor (PhD Student) - firt job: Transport for the North Vicent Sanz Marco (PDRA) - Assistant professor at Osaka University, Japan Volker Seeker (PDRA) - now with Meta AI Guixin Ye - now associate professor; Best paper award nomination at CCS 2018, ACM China Best PhD Dissertation Award (Shaanxi Province).

item.title: Awards and Recognition
item.description: CGO 2025 Distinguished Paper Award CGO 2024 Test-of-Time Award Named among Standford World’s Top 2% Scientists 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024 Facebook research award, 2021 Best Paper Award: ACM/IEEE PACT 2010, ACM/IEEE CGO 2017, ACM/IEEE PACT 2017, ACM/IEEE CGO 2019 Best Paper Nomination: ACM SC 2023, ACM CCS 2018, ACM SenSys 2019 Best Presentation Award: ACM/IEEE PACT 2010, ACM/IEEE CGO 2013 HiPEAC Paper Award: ASPLOS 2024, PLDI 2021, PLDI 2020, PLDI 2009 - for “publishing their work at conferences in which Europe is not strongly represented” IBM Bravo!

item.title: Biography
item.description: July 2019 - , Professor (Associate Professor prior 2022) School of Computing, University of Leeds September 2013 - July 2019, Senior Lecturer (Lecturer prior 2017), School of Computing and Communications, Lancaster University. 2012 - 2013, Research Associate, the University of Edinbugh. 2007 - 2011, PhD Student, the University of Edinburgh. Nominated for BCS Distinguished Dissertation Award; 2005 - 2007, Research Staff member, IBM China Research Lab
